backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and encrypted case management with access‑controlled CRUD operations and status/hearing updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing authentication bug investigations, file scopes, components, and test IDs for three high-confidence tasks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend modules including pages, components, hooks, crypto utilities, and case-management logic.
frontend/.env.production.example: Example production env file showing how to configure a custom or default Internet Identity URL.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_MAINNET.md: Mainnet deployment guide explaining prerequisites and how to configure Internet Identity for production builds.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme definitions with light/dark mode variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack router routes, React Query client, Internet Identity provider, theming, and global layout with RequireAuth.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using useAuthUi with diagnostic logging and state‑aware labeling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard handling redirects, intended-route restoration, loop prevention, and UI states for login/init errors.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form component for creating or editing a case, handling core fields plus nested hearings and evidence editors. Manages form state, submission, and field updates.
frontend/src/components/cases/EvidenceEd: Manages a dynamic list of evidence entries with add, edit, and remove functionality. Renders textarea inputs inside cards.
frontend/src/components/cases/HearingsEd: Provides UI to add, edit, and remove hearings, including date, status, outcome, and notes. Updates parent state with structured hearing objects.
frontend/src/components/cases/StatusBadg: Displays a styled badge for a case status using label and color helpers. Accepts optional class overrides.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/CasesT: Sortable table displaying case records with status badges and navigation to case details. Supports sorting by multiple fields and configurable date column.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Filter controls for searching cases, filtering by status, and choosing the date column. Updates parent state through provided callbacks.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Application-wide error boundary that catches runtime errors and shows a recovery UI. Provides a session-clearing recovery action and logs diagnostic info.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component rendering header, navigation, footer, auth checks, and profile dialog. Handles navigation and displays routes conditionally based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting authenticated users to set a display name stored in localStorage. Opens only when a name is missing and saves it on submit.
frontend/src/components/security/UnlockV: Dialog for initializing or unlocking the encrypted vault using a passphrase. Handles validation, error display, and interaction with the encryption hook.
frontend/src/crypto/keyStore.ts: Local key store managing vault initialization, key derivation, unlocking, and storage of salt per principal. Provides access to the derived CryptoKey and lock state.
frontend/src/crypto/webCrypto.ts: Utility functions for deriving keys, encrypting, decrypting, and handling salts using WebCrypto APIs. Implements AES-GCM encryption and PBKDF2 key derivation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity. Recreates actors on identity change and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthUi.ts: UI-oriented auth hook with normalized error handling, status derivation, login safeguards, and logout/reset helpers. Wraps useInternetIdentity with additional UI logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useEncryption.ts: Hook managing vault encryption state using keyStore, including initialization, unlocking, locking, and encrypt/decrypt helpers. Syncs state with the authenticated principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating case data via an actor, with success/error toasts and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and print media overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single case by fetching, decrypting, and presenting details with options to edit or delete.
frontend/src/pages/CaseEditPage.tsx: Handles creating or editing a case, including decryption, form display, and saving encrypted updates.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows a dashboard of decrypted cases with filtering, printing, PDF export, and vault unlocking when encryption is locked.
frontend/src/pages/IntegrationsPage.tsx: React page for configuring integration API settings, saving them to localStorage, and triggering a mock sync with status tracking.
frontend/src/processEnvShim.ts: Shim that populates process.env from Vite env variables and validates II_URL for Internet Identity compatibility.
frontend/src/services/cases/caseCodec.ts: Provides functions to encrypt and decrypt case data fields using supplied crypto functions.
frontend/src/services/status/statusRules: Computes automatic case status and provides helpers for status labels and color classes.
frontend/src/utils/authClientStorage.ts: Clears localStorage and IndexedDB entries related to Internet Identity and AuthClient sessions.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Optional debug logger for authentication and navigation events with sensitive-data sanitization.
frontend/src/utils/exportPdf.ts: Generates a CSV export of cases with selected date fields and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/utils/intendedRoute.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears intended post-login routes in sessionStorage with normalization.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeAuthError.ts: Converts unknown authentication errors into safe, user-friendly strings with extensive fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/printReport.ts: Generates a printable HTML report for case data in a new window, formatting dates and statuses into a styled table.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests, including an auth-related infinite render loop bug.
